title: Louie Nunn
summary: Louie Broady Nunn (March 8, 1924 â€“ January 29, 2004) was an American politician who served as the 52nd governor of Kentucky. Elected in 1967, he was the only Republican to hold the office between the end of Simeon Willis' term in 1947 and the election of Ernie Fletcher in 2003.
